issue.title: www.youtube.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Up06CryWQpE](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3DUp06CryWQpE) ### Comment Username: @Grandpat-Star > When I try to watch the official music video for Strawberry Wine by Deana Carter Official the adblock has not worked since last night. I have tried reloading and ads show up. When I have tried reloading other videos such as Introducing LEGO Braille Bricks – Play with Braille by Lego official, and the official audio for The Wrong Girl (Greatest Hits Version) by Lee Ann Womack Official the ads are not there. This seems to be contained to this specific video. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/ghclp6szi9s0c8woscogs0w80og0ggsds7aguah22o.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/tfx68g4v7tw4wkkg0g0s44go0o88sc4dmcps04vezs.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser extension v4.1.57 Browser: | Firefox Stealth mode: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

Other:
Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion Other extensions used: | Duck Duck Go Privacy Essentials, Return Youtube Disklike Button, Youtube-shorts block, CustomTube, and Replace Youtube's Home with Subscriptions

because as far as I know previously the youtube link that was shared was just short without that "si="

comment.body:
what do you mean post a link with spoiler enabled? thats a screenshot of the reddit spoiler button on dark mode. do you want me to post a reddit link that has a spoiler? here https://www.reddit.com/r/BaldursGate3/comments/vdsdlc/all_the_ways_to_boost_ability_scores_in_bg3_ea/

i feel like there is a failure in communication here. the mobile app banner filter, when enabled, interferes with reddit's ability to let you post comments, disables the comment overlay, and prevents you from being able to view spoilered text and images.

issue.title: Meross device pairing error (com.meross.meross)
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

V4.1

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

Meross (com.meross.meross)

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard French filter, AdGuard German filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Widgets filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, EasyList, Adblock Warning Removal List, NoCoin Filter List, Legitimate URL Shortener

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Setting up a smart home device with the Meross app fails when Adguard is enabled. Tried with several Meross MSS310 smart plugs.

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

The setup process stays on this screen for a few minutes before failing.

![Screenshot_2023-09-01-04-11-22-51_56b7547d8e4eb7c7b8ab580c8df8134f](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/49079695/062e5028-59a7-4a8c-b4d5-93ff12add1dc)

</details>



### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
I know it will be complicated to replicate, as a physical device is needed.
If you need any logs or filtering history, please tell me and also how to do it.

issue.title: www.youtube.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Up06CryWQpE](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3DUp06CryWQpE) ### Comment Username: @Grandpat-Star > When I try to watch the official music video for Strawberry Wine by Deana Carter Official the adblock has not worked since last night. I have tried reloading and ads show up. When I have tried reloading other videos such as Introducing LEGO Braille Bricks – Play with Braille by Lego official, and the official audio for The Wrong Girl (Greatest Hits Version) by Lee Ann Womack Official the ads are not there. This seems to be contained to this specific video. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/ghclp6szi9s0c8woscogs0w80og0ggsds7aguah22o.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/tfx68g4v7tw4wkkg0g0s44go0o88sc4dmcps04vezs.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser extension v4.1.57 Browser: | Firefox Stealth mode: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

Other:
Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion Other extensions used: | Duck Duck Go Privacy Essentials, Return Youtube Disklike Button, Youtube-shorts block, CustomTube, and Replace Youtube's Home with Subscriptions
